Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Nestled amongst the local flora & fauna you will find this spectacular lifestyle property.
This home is set on approximately 760m2 of manicured gardens all overlooking Cowes Golf Ranch, the Salt water creek & a short 1 minute walk to beach.
The home offers open plan living kitchen & dining opening on a generous semi enclosed decked area offering views of the golf ranch.
In addition the home offers 3 spacious bed rooms with BIR, Large Family Bathroom, split system heating and cooling, and a wood fire to keep you warm while you relax and enjoy the view over the treed canopy.
Call today to book your inspection and see what more this home has to offer.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY LIVING IN COWES
This well-appointed contemporary home boasts a parkfront position and is situated in a modern estate surrounded by quality built homes and walking distance to Cowes bay beaches.
Comprising of three carpeted bedrooms, the master features an ensuite with double vanities, walk in robe and adjoining powder room . The light filled open plan living/ dining/ kitchen area features beautiful Tasmanian Oak floors and the kitchen features an island bench, stone benchtops, large oven with gas cooktops and rangehood. The dining area opens onto an undercover outdoor Merbau deck with bistro blinds, extending to a fenced courtyard - great for entertaining. The main bathroom features a beautiful free standing bathtub and separate shower.
The property also includes ducted vacuuming, Split system air conditioning, a large double lock up garage including large laundry and internal access, 2 additional off street car spaces, outdoor shower, and a rear courtyard with clothesline. With quality fittings throughout and located opposite parkland and playground, inspection is sure to delight, call today!
Insights: 3 Kirsten Close, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
LOOK NO FURTHER
This spacious townhouse spread over two levels, offers low maintenance coastal living at it’s best.
Consisting of three generous bedrooms all with built in robes and the master with walk in robe and en-suite.
The family living area downstairs opens to the dining and kitchen zone with island bench and quality appliances; plus reverse cycle air conditioning unit and gas log fire providing comfort whatever the climate.
Upstairs offers a second living room and the main bathroom with separate toilet. The rear courtyard is fully fenced and includes a covered outdoor area and the large remote double garage has internal access to the house.
Part of a secure gated complex that has access to a shared in-ground swimming pool and communal undercover area and only a short walk to central Cowes and bay beach this home has plenty of options.
Make this your new investment, private retreat or permanent family home today.

Description:
Under Construction.
Enjoy a lifestyle where the beach, cafés, schools, and public transport are all at your door step!
A stunning new home which is currently under construction, in a highly sought after prestigious Whytesands Estate and set on a 560qm block and less then 1.5km (approx) to the stunning, north facing Cowes beach and only 2.4km (approx) to the Cowes shopping precinct.
This outstanding home showcases 4 spacious bedrooms with built in robes and the family-sized central bathroom offering stylish and modern design. The generous master bedroom is complete with full ensuite and walk in robe. A modern, open plan kitchen offers a stone island bench and stainless steel appliances whilst the living area enjoys the natural North light and views out to the private outdoor sitting area!
With luxurious upgrade features including high ceilings and doorways, stone benchtops, stylish floor tiles, floating floors , L.E.D Lighting, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, 6 star energy rating, 5000L water tank, and ducted vacuum.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
A Wonderful Gem!
Perfectly positioned within just a short walk to shops, cafe's, restaurants, doctors, school and RSL, is this very appealing, private and superbly presented three bedroom single level home providing the perfect retreat for either permanent or holiday living.
Comprising light filled, generous open plan living, spacious and practical kitchen and dining space highlighted by crisp white walls and beautiful polished timber floors leading out to a fabulous large north facing covered entertaining area with a separate covered barbecue area. Boasting three double size bedrooms with built in robes, dual access bathroom from the master bedroom including a bath and separate shower, as well as a good size laundry combined bathroom with a shower and an additional separate second toilet.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling, electric cooking, dishwasher
A wonderful opportunity exists to purchase this amazing low maintenance residence set on 280 sqm approx allotment complete with lovely landscaped gardens, garden shed, secure carport and ample room for parking - inspection will impress!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION WALK TO THE MAIN ST AND THE BEACH
Enjoying a street-front setting town house, this 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom townhouse presents a remarkable opportunity for its size, location quality construction.
Entering your private entrance you will see a very open corridor that spans the height of the second level creating a grand staircase look. Next is a generous lounge separate from the dining area that leads out to a private courtyard with covered decking. The kitchen has a generous amount of storage including a pantry and a dishwasher. Downstairs also features the Master Bedroom with an en-suite.
Upstairs, 2 double bedrooms with built-in robes are serviced by a central bathroom and another living area.
Buy today and benefit from its great position; close to transport, schools, parklands, bowling club, gym, medical centre, footy oval, tennis courts and beach.
Other features include:
-off street double garage w/remote
- separate laundry
-outside shower
-porcelain tiles

Description:
FAMILY LIVING AT IT'S FINEST!
This unique family home is located in the sought after area of western Cowes and just a short walk to Red Rocks and Ventnor beaches.
Featuring two generous sized bedrooms with built in robes and a third double bedroom with potential to be converted into two separate bedrooms. The open plan kitchen/living area is complemented by a beautiful wood fire place, new split system and double sliding doors out onto the front veranda.
The property features a huge backyard equipped with the perfect cubby house to provide endless entertainment for the kids! There is also a lock up garage with ample storage, garden shed and is fully fenced. Located in a quiet area perfect for you and the family or an ideal investment opportunity.
Don’t miss the chance to view this fantastic property. Book a private inspection today!

IN THE HEART OF TOWN
Located in the heart of town with shops and restaurants only steps away and the beach an easy walk to the end of the main street. This great sized apartment is perfect.
Featuring two generous bedrooms, master with semi ens-uite and large, light filled, open plan living with sunny north facing balcony. There is also secure remote gated entrance with undercover parking and the bonus of being sold fully furnished.
A must inspect.

Description:
OPEN FOR INSPECTION CANCELLED PROPERTY UNDER OFFER
Interior luxury and outdoor allure form the exceptional combination created by this informal home and outdoor solar heated pool.
Beautifully bright, entirely private and impressively spacious, this inviting 5 bedroom/4 bathroom home has everything you need to enjoy holidays/living.
A fully tiled entry leads in to a smaller living area suitable for children to entertain where a separate laundry, four bedrooms – three with ensuite and bathroom can be revealed.
Find your way up the timber staircase to unveil beautiful timber floors, large master bedroom with ensuite and powder room to service guests. A fabulous open plan kitchen/dining/living area unfolds out to a west facing deck (displaying slight water views) and a larger eastern deck under cover and secure with bistro blinds to create a secure entertaining zone which looks over the in ground swimming pool.
The kitchen has all of the luxurious finishes including stone benchtops/splashbacks/enormous amount of storage and cupboard space, room for a 10 seater dining table and large living area to lounge and relax.
In the beautiful low maintenance back yard, tall manicured trees keep the solar heated pool private from all angles and secure for everyone to appreciate.
A double lock up garage attached to the house is large enough to fit the boat/caravan and all pool/beach toys including a roller door to the rear.
Located within a short distance to the Cowes central shopping district and The Northern Cowes Bay Beach this house is one with the lot.
Please call for inspections: Jenni Kent - 0428566643
Insights: 109 Mckenzie Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 14 other 5 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

This is the perfect home to create lasting memories with family and friends, The rear deck is perfect to relax even in the winter months, set over a full block there is ample room for a caravan or boat an inspection is a must.

Description:
Quiet Location
Nestled in this quiet location awaits the perfect beach house. With the added feature of an easy walk to the Cowes foreshore. Abutting the reserve only helps create an even quieter environment . The second large living area flows to a large entering area which is perfect for family and friends. With ample room for a boat or caravan only adds to this very attractive package . With many extra features as extra storage and under cover entertaining, second toilet an inspection is a must.

Description:
PANORAMIC PARADISE
LUXURY HOME – SPECTACULAR SUNSETS OVERLOOKING GOLF COURSE
This Red Rocks Beach home has it ALL!! Set on a large 1250m2 (approx.) allotment, this magnificent property offers 3 large living areas, 4 bedrooms and just a small stroll to the much sought-after area of Red Rocks Beach.
This 40square architect designed home has been constructed by one of Phillip Islands leading builders and built to top display home specs.
Panoramic uninterrupted views over golf course & lakes, foreshore & farmland. Superb undercover verandas overlooking dynamic landscape rich in wildlife including local and significant migratory birdlife. With direct access to the saltwater creek, you can kayak straight into the bay from your door step.
The first living zone offers a sunken lounge with cosy fireplace and direct access onto deck. The second formal living area is a great place to sit back and enjoy a movie, read a book and just relax. Separate dining area, gourmet kitchen with stone bench tops, walk in butler's pantry highlight window looking over the stunning Citrus tree's.
- Polished timber floor throughout
- Citrus and Olive Tree's
- High end fixtures and fittings
- Large allotment 1250m2 Approx.
- High set ceilings
- 4 Minute walk to Red Rocks Beach
The generous master retreat with full ensuite facilities, free standing bath, separate toilet, large walk in robe and private deck. A further 3 spacious double bedrooms offer high end finish such as private courtyard, integrated study, all sliding robes and built in ash bench perfect for a study to complete this beautiful home!
This incredible home is promoted more by its vast outside veranda designed for the entertainer, with BBQ and large alfresco dining area built to take in the magnificent surroundings.
If you have been looking for one of the islands rare and special homes within a short stroll to Red Rocks beach and breathtaking sunsets, this definitely has to be one to inspect
Insights: 8 SPAVEN COURT, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
THERE'S NO NEED TO BUILD
Why have the stress of building when all the hard work has been done for you. This lovely home is perfect to move straight into. Complete with 3 good size bedrooms, all with robes, ensuite & WIR to Main, 2 separate living zones. The kitchen is perfect complete with butlers pantry, 900mm cook top ideal for entertaining family & friends. Other features include double garage with internal access, reverse cycle heating & cooling, parking access to the side of the house which is perfect for the boat or caravan. This home is sure to please the fussiest of buyers call for a private inspection today.

Description:
SPACIOUS TOWNHOUSE IN A PERFECT CENTRAL LOCATION
This fantastic 2 bedroom unit is located in a prime position, only 230 metres from Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the main street and would make an ideal investment property or holiday home.
Comprising of a spacious living/ dining area with access to an undercover deck, kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven and cooktop, master bedroom with BIR’s and ensuite with spa bath, a second bathroom with large shower and toilet, laundry with external access and single car garage with remote door. Heating and cooling is provided by a reverse cycle split system.
Currently tenanted with a long term tenant, start your investment portfolio with this fantastic property. Inspection strictly by appointment only.

Description:
Relaxed Seaside Escape
Perfectly positioned just metres to the Cowes shopping precinct and only a short stroll to the fabulous north facing bay beach, is this beautifully maintained, light filled and substantial two bedroom double storey townhouse. The lower level comprises a powder room and a great size open plan living, kitchen and dining area which flows through to a wonderful north facing alfresco area perfect for entertaining with family and friends or just relaxing in tranquil, private settings.
Timber stairs lead up to a spacious second level boasting a second living area, with access onto an additional north facing private balcony with a lovely treed outlook, two good size bedrooms with built in robes and a large dual access ensuite/family bathroom, including corner spa.
There is also a second open parking space beside the garage, ideal for parking your boat.
Additional features include: dishwasher, electric upright stove and range-hood, two split system heating/cooling units, heated towel rail
The garage allows direct internal access while having the convenience of a laundry with clothes line and access to the back courtyard.
This low maintenance lifestyle is perfect for either holiday/permanent living or as an investment property.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island
